I do not have access to the latest events or news. however, here are some possible measures that may be taken in pampanga to ensure public sanitation and cleanliness:

1. regular cleaning and disinfection of public areas such as parks, plazas, markets, and public toilets.
2. implementation of waste management programs such as proper segregation and collection of garbage, and promotion of composting and recycling.
3. campaigns and information dissemination on the proper way of handling and disposing of waste.
4. monitoring and inspection of food establishments and public markets to ensure compliance with health and sanitation standards.
5. provision of adequate sewage and drainage systems to prevent flooding and water contamination.
6. promotion of personal hygiene practices such as hand washing and use of face masks in public.
7. strict enforcement of environmental laws and regulations and imposition of penalties for violators.
